name: Hoverboard Surfers 3D
description:
Surf like a pro in the most realistic hoverboard game ever! Jump on your board, speed up, and see how far you can ride in #1 thrilling and frenzied 3D skateboarding game.

Drift as fast as you can and dodge the oncoming cars! Test you reflex as you skate down the road and subway bustling with traffic and deadly obstacles. Swipe to turn, jump and crouch your way across stunning 3D environments, collect coins to buy power ups and make cool stunts! The only limit is what you can get away with!

Game Features:
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic hoverboard physics and smooth controls
- Nerve wrecking hoverboard stunts
- 5 hoverboards and 5 skateboards to unlock

Notes: Hoverboard is a type of portable, rechargeable battery-powered self-balancing two-wheeled scooter.
